titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

p.add: Malherbe, Corneille, Racine, Moliere, Boileau, Quinault, La Fontaine, Rousseau, de la Motte, Chaulieu, Gresset, Crebillon, Voltaire, Destouches, Regnard. Malebranche, Rousseau, Helvetius, Montesquieu, Mirabaud, Pascal, Nicole.

div.ab:
7. Tu. M. Called at Webb's
.

8. W. Tu.
Brand Hollis called.
The Ton, written by la. Wallace, acted.

10. Th.
Hastings's trial. 12th day. resumed.
11. F. Dined[.?] at Leg of Pork {.} Doctor Priestley in London.

13. Su. April. Dine at Holcrofts
.

15. Tu. Dine at Hollis's
. Doctor Horsley gazetted. Treaty with Holland .

17. Th.
Fawcet calls. King of France to his parliament.
18. Fr. Dine with Fawcet in Vere Street . Holcroft calls, & sups . Bastard on Admirals 133 to 150
19. Sa. Dine at Robinson's , with Kippis & Holcroft . See the opera Giulio Sabino, & the ballet of Adele de Ponthieu. Send to Van Effin .

20. Su. April.
Beaufoy at Kensington .

22. Tu.
circa . Call at B. Hollis's
.

23. W.
Holcroft calls. Send him corrections of Trenck.

26. Sa.
Priestley dined at T. H.'s .

Apr. 27. Su.
Kensington Gardens, see baron Fox
. Call at Holcroft's
.
28. M. Hear Sir Gilbert Elliot . Fawcet calls, & sups . See O' Brien & Grey, but do not speak.

29. Tu. Dine at Hollis's
.

May 4. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
. Call on Mr Close , Tower Hill .

7. W. Hear Sir G. Elliot . Dine at Holcroft's
.

8. Th. Tea, Holcroft's
. Dinner at Cadel's on Gibbon's birth day & day of publication, Sheffield, Fullarton, Reynolds, Gillies, Kippis . Cour Plénière .
9. Fr. Exhibition. Nunducomar. 55 to 73. Speak with O' Brien . Priestley from London .

10. Sa.
Wilson calls: correct for him Graham's Letter to Pitt on Scotch Reform .

May 11. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
. Call on Wilson
.

12. M. Dine at Robinson's , with Kippis, Holcroft, Meek, & chev. Mouradgea . Hanover Square concert. See Yoel
.

ab.seg: Dine at Hollis's , with Kippis, Lindsey & Planta

div.ab: 14. W. Di Dine with Fawcet in Vere Street . He sleeps in N. Street . Marshal for Southampton.
15. Th. Dine with Fawcet at Vere Street. He sleeps in Norfolk Street.

17. Sa.
Holcroft sups.

18. Su. May. Dine at Holcroft's
.

20. Tu.
Vauxhal with Holcroft
.
27. Tu. Dine at Hollis's with Fraser & Planta . See Young Norman, the Russian traveller [:?]
28. W. See bishop Newton's exhibition. Dine with Fawcet in Vere Street

3. Tu. Hear Sheridan . Earl Mansfield resigns. See miss Williams, who goes every day To the trial Sheridan's speech introduced by Geo. Harding[e?]
. 3, 6, 10, 13

6. F. Dine at Hollis's with Simpson, E. T . Call at Webb's
. do
Miss Williams's
See

7. Sa.
Sir Lloyd Kenyon a peer. R. P. Arden master of the rolls.

June 8. Su.
Holcroft dines.

9. M.
Lord Kenyon lord chief justice of the king's bench.

13. F. Call at Webb's, d
Hastings's trial adjourned.
17. Tu. Holcroft sups. Dine at Hollis's with Barnard & Fraser . Barry at tea. Call at Webbs, Miss Williams's

20. F. Dine at Robinson's with Hamilton & Raikes
Holcroft sups.

25. W.
Willis calls. Holcroft calls.
27. F. Dine at Robinson's with Hamilton & Raikes .

28. Sa.
Holcroft sups. Sir A. Macdonald attorney general; sir J. Scott, solicitor.
June 29. Su. Dine at Holcroft's with Shield & Clementi; Parkinson and Bosse .

ab.ref: Dispute between Pitt & Thurlow, respecting Arden's appointment to the rolls, terminated in favour of the former.

div.ab: July 1. Tu. Dine at Hollis's with Lindsey . Go with Barry to see the Cerberus groupe by Locatelli .

2. W. Call on Kippis
.

3. Th.
Fawcet & M[e?] dine.

4. F.
Chappin sups.
5. Sa. Dine at Clapham, sup at Epsom. E. Bearcroft chief justice of Chester; F. Burton a Welch judge, v. D. B .
July 6. Su. Dine at Dorking, sup at Guildford.

7. M. Dine at Kingston. Call on Kippis
. Holcroft sups.

10. Th. Call at Miss Williams's
.
11. F. Call at Parliament prorogued.

12. Sa. Call at Webb's
. do
Barry's
. Earl of Chatham first lord of Admiralty; lord Hood puisne .

July 13. Su.
Holcroft & Barry call. Mrs Cooper returns.
G. & A. Dyson dine.

14. M. See Canning : call on Hamilton
: dine at Robinson's
: nomination of S. J. Townshend : Shield at the Bedford .
15. Tu. Dine at Hollis's with Fraser, & Planta . Barry au soir.

16. W. Call at Barry's
.
17. Th. Dine at Shield's , with Holcroft, Clementi, Michi[e?], Condel, James Smith, Bosse & Mrs Soderini .

18. F. Call at Wilson's
,
Barry's
&
Hollis's
. Go to the Hustings. See Opie's pictures. Dine at the Leg of Pork. Ht sups.
19. Sa. Sleep at Kingston.
July 20. Su. Arrive at Guildford.

July 27. Su.
T. Cooper at Guildford .
4. M. Westminter election closes.

8. F.
Hamilton & Robinson at Guildford .
Aug. 17. Su. Marshal returns.
18. M. Drink tea at Farnham: sleep at Godalmin.
19. Tu. Dine at the White Hart.

20. W. Dine at Smith's
.
21. Th. Dine at Bagshot: sleep at Oakingham.
22. F. Dine at Reading: sleep at Bracknal fair.

24. Su.
Holcroft at Guildford .
25. M. Dine at the White Hart with Holcroft & Fenwick .

4. Th.
Jour de mauvaise nouvelle . Marshal for Southampton .

Sep. 7. Su.
Marshal returns.

10. W.
Marshal for Southampton .

11. Th.
Marshal returns.
12. // Fr. Come to town .

13. Sa. Call on Mrs Cooper
. Sleep in Cold Bath Fields.

Sep. 14. Su. Called on Barry
: met Wilson & Heath . Dine at Hollis with Barry & J. H. : see Brand Hollis .

15. M. Ride & dine with Holcroft. Mrs do
.

16. Tu. Call on Close
.

17. W.
Explain to Holcroft .
Marshal to Guildford .

18. Th. Calls on Kippis
. Holcroft calls. Marshal returns.

19. Fr. Call on, & am called on by Ht
. T. Cooper in town .
20. Sa. Drink tea at miss Williams's , with Kippis & Moore .

Sep. 21. Su. Dine at Holcrofts
.

22. M. Dine at Robinson's with Hamilton : sup at Holcroft's
.

23. Tu.
Holcroft explains to Robinson .

24. W. Call on Robinson
: drink tea with Mrs Cooper
.

26. F. Call on Robinson
: M. for Southampton : Holcroft calls.

27. Sa. Call on Mr Hewlet
.

29. M.
T. C. goes to Shacklewel .

30. Tu.
Ml returns. Interview with Thomas Latter of Hertfordshire, esquire .

Oct. 1. W. Dine with Robinson . Conversation about bail. Call on Holcroft
.
3. F. Write to Lomer & Shaw . Sleep in Marybone Street.
Oct. 5. Su. Letter from Mr Latter .

7. Tu. Dine at Hollis's with Topham, Planta, Kippis & Towers . Call on Holcroft
.

9. Th.
Robinson calls.

10. F.
Holcroft calls. Read the Widow & the Will.

Oct. 12. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

16. Th.
Holcroft calls. sup chez lui
: see Mercier .

Oct. 19. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Berwick . Call on Robinson
.

20. M. Call on Holcroft
: see Mercier .
21. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with J. Hollis, Planta, Fraser, Kippis & Towers . Barry au soir.

23. Th.
Holcroft calls.
24. F. Dine at Robinson's , with Mercier, le Vade, P. Robinson, Thurlow, Woodfal, Holcroft & Hamilton .

Oct. 26. Su.
Dine at Hollis's, with J. H
. Tea at Miss Williams's, with major Barry, Swift, Cruickshank, Miss Weston, Mrs Barwel & Mrs Clarke.
27. M. Tea at miss Williams's , with major Barry, Swift, Cruickshank, & Mes Weston, Barwel & Clarke .
Nov. 2. // Su. Dine at Holcroft's with Mercier : Shield at tea. Sup at Pol. Robinson's , with Holcroft .

4. Tu. Call at Hamilton's
,
Shield's
&
miss Williams's
. Second act of Robinson's farce.

7. F. Dine at Hamilton's , with Robinson, Archd , Holcroft, Nicholson, & Mercier .
Le roi mourant .

Nov. 9. Sa.
Dine at Fenwick's with Holcroft & Mercier .
11. Tu. Dine at Hollis's with Kippis, Topham & Perkins . Tea miss Williams's , with Kippis, Moore, m. Barry, S. Rogers, Gregory and Lewis.
17. M. Dine at Nicholson's , with Robinson, Hamiltons & Holcroft .

18. Tu.
Capt Greville's duel.

19. W. sup at Holcroft's
.

20. Th.
N. Webb married: W. writes. Parliament meets: adjourns to 4 Dec.
21. F. Dine at Hollis's , with J. Hollis, Disney, Kippis & Towers .

22. Sa.
Meilleur nouvelle . Robinson calls.

Nov. 23. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: see Jas Aickin .
29. Sa. Dine at Hollis's , with J. Hollis & Dr Lister . King removes to Kew .

Dec. 1. M. Call at Holcroft's
. Law of Parliament published.
3. W. Dine at Holcroft's , with Hamilton, Robinson, Woodfal, Shield, P. Robinson & Aickins .

4. Th. See Fawcet . Parliament meets.
Holcroft calls.

5. F. Dine at Hollis's , with J. Hollis & Towers .
sup
.

8. M. Call on Robinson
&
Brand Hollis
: Go to the House of Commons .
10. W. Right of the P. of W. asserted by Fox .
11. Th. do by lord Loughborough .

13. Sa.
Charles IV, King of Spain.

Dec. 14. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.
15. M. Question of right deprecated by the dukes of York & Gloucester. Thurlow ambiguous.

16. Tu. Dine at Hollis's
. Barry at tea. sup . Right of Parliament to appoint a regency decided, 267 to 203. Fox censures Thurlow .

17. W.
Oczakow taken.

18. Th.
T. Cooper at Marybone Str . Holcroft sups.
19. F. Avoid Beaufoy .
22. M. Dine at Robinson's with Nicholson, Hamilton & Holcroft . See John Walker .

23. Tu.
Macbeth.
28. Su. Dine at Holcroft's with Fenwic .

30. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with sir Harry Houghton, see Brand Hollis & Barry
{.}
sup
.
